description: Number of conjugacy classes in the symmetric group S_n that have even number of elements.
comments: The total number of conjugacy classes of S_n is the partition function p(n) (sequence A000041) and the number of conjugacy classes that have odd number of elements is given in A060632 so a(n) = A000041(n) - A060632(n) for n >= 1
author: Avi Peretz (njk(AT)netvision.net.il), Apr 17 2001
